website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for withstanding the rigors of plowing snow, moving manure, and hauling brush without any complications.
pros: Can be plugged numerous times after being punctured, giving it a second life in the rare case that it does sustain a hole the first time around
cons: A bargain on many levels, but it doesn’t quite match the Bearclaw in terms of bang for the buck

customer_reviews.title: They are AWESOME in mud and heavy wet snow
customer_reviews.text: CAUTION! These tires are AGGRESSIVE. They are AWESOME in mud and heavy wet snow. That said, with my solid posi rear in my old Honda 350 TRX you can not turn without digging up anything short of a paved road. Not something you would ride around in your yard unless you really hate grass and love that "just roto-tilled" look. I wanted to be able to skid firewood logs off my hillside in 8 inches of late winter settled crusty snow. I tried chains and wasn't happy with trying to keep them on when pawing and digging. Went to these tires and WOW. Get around now AWESOME. Happy-Happy-Happy.
customer_reviews.author: Capitol Rock

customer_reviews.title: Great Tires for the Mud and Trails
customer_reviews.text: I bought these (front and rear) to replace the 16 year old stock tires on my 400 Honda. I couldn’t be happier with their performance on the trails and in the mud. I took it out to a really cool ATV park a week after putting them on and had a great time. I’m looking forward to how they perform in the snow this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: The BEST for plowing snow!
customer_reviews.text: These tires are amazing! I use my Honda ATV mostly for plowing snow, and we've had plenty of it already this winter. I have a rather steep driveway, and with the OEM tires I couldn't plow uphill -- no traction. Even to do that good I had to put cable chains on the front tires. With these tires I plow both ways (and no chains). It has cut down the time it takes me to plow my hundred yards of driveway by at least a third.
customer_reviews.author: BLH

customer_reviews.title: Wear way too fast
customer_reviews.text: Used on a Kawa Mule Pro. Purchased because they are 6 ply. After 200 miles on the ranch, the first layer of tread is worn. Also makes the utv lean more than original tires in corners. Plus is that within 400 miles I’ve ad no flat tires. Won’t be buying them again Update: 14 months/1200 miles later, tires worn out completely on daily farm use. Only positive is that I never had any punctures.
customer_reviews.author: BisonGuy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my old OEM tires and my 4x4 Suzuki. I replaced my front tires first because shipping was slower on the larger back tires. I made it to the top of a snowy peak in four wheel drive because the front tires were so much better than the old back tires. MY back end was sliding all over and my front end stayed on track. They have an open design that makes it so the mud does not stick to the tires. I thought the price was really good compared to other tires out there.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Get a grip~ These do!
customer_reviews.text: These have been excellent tires on our quad. Mud, dirt, gravel, grass, pavement, it powers through it all. Ive had no troube hauling our loaded dump cart up our steep muddy hills this winter. I could barely make it before. I love that the tread design also allows for a smooth ride on pavement without taking away from the offroad performance. Excellent tread design! We are going to the dunes later this year and I'm predicting that these will do great. The treads basically have paddle cups built into them. I will post an update with a sand report. In conclusion: excellent tire, great value.
customer_reviews.author: Evergreen State

customer_reviews.title: These tires replace a pair of Mud Lites I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: These tires replace a pair of Mud Lites I bought about seven years ago. The knobs on the old ones were wearing down a bit after lots of use. The tires were installed on the rear of an electric golf cart (2 wheel drive) used for hunting. The electric cart performs very well on muddy trails and the tires are LIGHT which helps the battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck. Made in USA!
customer_reviews.text: 3 lbs lighter than the bear claws they replaced. Very soft rubber compound but i only run off road so thats what i was looking for. Ride decent, pull great for a mud tire with 5/8" tall lugs (no they are not 3/4" as advertised). I only gave three stars for durability/sturdiness because i just started running these. Will report back later after some seat time.
customer_reviews.author: Smith Farms

customer_reviews.title: mounted good. They look great
customer_reviews.text: got my rear end ITP mud lites today. mounted good. They look great! going to test them out tomorrow turkey hunting. rode my Arctic Cat 500 after i mounted them. Great ride! ill post a follow up when i cross a few cut overs with log jams and post how they held up. If they hold up, ill be getting the front tires changed out with these ITP mud lites. ill give it a five star if they hold up crossing cut over log jams without puncturing them.
customer_reviews.author: Commoguy

customer_reviews.title: Tires that are ready for Alaskan Interior.
customer_reviews.text: These have brought a whole new world of use to my classic big red! I now can handle mud a lot better. 8 pounds of pressure, and away you go. Especially for the price these are great tires. Sidewall is tough aswell, I have put mine in situations I would expect them to be punctured, and thus far they have survived.
customer_reviews.author: Akoffgrid

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good tires, check around for price, E-Bay may be cheaper.
customer_reviews.text: I think these are made in the USA. Also, they are handling quite well. This is a replacement for some tires I'm getting for my second machine. I find these better than what my Suzuki came with, and three times better than the Carlisle tires I had on just before these.
customer_reviews.author: Judge Mental

customer_reviews.title: ITP MUD LITE AT MUD TERRAIN TIRES ARE GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Great tires. I’ve used at least two sets of these tires before and they’re always great! Good traction in any kind of Louisiana mud and long tread life.
customer_reviews.author: TobyG

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These tires are absolutely incredible. Old tires on the left and new on the right in the picture. Just bought the rear and put up a picture from the trail. Went through a few feet of water, up 45 plus degree inclines and deep mud without getting stuck once this time even though I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Finn

customer_reviews.title: Look great on my fourtrax
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to replace worn out tires on our honda fourtrax. They fit good and look good. Changing them yourself is alot of work but it can be done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tire for price.
customer_reviews.text: These tires are mounted on a Japanese mini truck. I use it on my deer lease. These tires work very well in all conditions here in east Texas.
customer_reviews.author: ERNIE STOKES

customer_reviews.title: Works real well and seem to be long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked at what the dealer wanted for tires...these work very well and were way less expensive...I have had them on the 4 wheeler for two years and they look great and work well...could not ask for more....and they were at a good price..especially with the free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Joel D. Rapose

customer_reviews.title: NO MORE GETTING STUCK IN MUD AND SNOW
customer_reviews.text: Saved $ on amazon. Installed them on a 340cc UTV and couldnt be happier. Mud and Snow before was NOT possible. Put these on and no problems at all they blow rite threw whatever i put in front of them.
customer_reviews.author: B Sny

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these tires. Only been running this set for a couple weeks, but have another set that's a couple years old. They hold up great, do good in all terrains. No flats yet, and that's saying alot since I live in hedge and locust thorn country.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and high quality
customer_reviews.text: These saved me so much money compared to getting them from the dealership. They are litterly the same tires that they wanted 112 a piece for. I had to cut my old tires off because we couldn't pop the bead but they were shot anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Gene H

customer_reviews.title: Great 4 wheeler tires
customer_reviews.text: my husband always buys these tires when ever our 4 wheelers need new ones. They last great and this was a wonderful value on price with super fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Great Tires!
customer_reviews.text: These Tires fit right on my Kawasaki Lakota 300. First trip on these tires were to the Hatfield & McCoy trails in West Virginia. These are the biggest badest trails around and these tires performed perfectly on them. No issue at all. Took the 2wd Lakota thru so huge mud holes as well. Would Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good tires.
customer_reviews.text: I put a set on the rear of my 2002 Sportsman 400. My 4x4 went out but these tires dug me out of the swamp every time. Good tires. ... I would prefer to have my 4x4 up and running again though. Good tires. Just don't get it in your head that tires will always get you out of the mud. You have to know what you're doing.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sets of different sizes. This set has a poor texture and a lot of flash. The extra rubber is in the seal area, center tread and sides. The other larger set looked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hanshaw

customer_reviews.title: Great tire
customer_reviews.text: These were the same tires I had on my ATV. Amazon had the best prices I could find. Hands down a great tire that you would not be disappointed with.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Pittie

customer_reviews.title: Great tires
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my 1997 Honda 300 Fourtrax. Original tires were 25x11-9. These were 25x12-9 and I got them because I couldn't find the exact same as I already had. I made smart choice. These are great tires and do a awesome job at digging my old Honda down the trail. I highly recommend these tires to anyone not wanting to spend a ton of money
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Just a good tire
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure there are much better tires out there but these tires do not disappoint. Still need a puncture sealant for just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good thing, it took them 1 hour per tire ...
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping. I did entertain the thought of trying to replace these on my own, but ended up having a powersport shop do it. Good thing, it took them 1 hour per tire to break the original tire/bead from a 1993 Honda Fourtrax. Tread is good, the shop informed me that this tread is softer therefore limit your time on concrete with them. Really happy at this point with them. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: dgm

customer_reviews.title: Greatest tires ever made
customer_reviews.text: Greatest tires ever made. They will pull your quad threw anything. The only issue is god forbid you drive over your lawn there will be nothing left.
customer_reviews.author: CDR

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: The tires replaced my ITP Mud Lite Radials and are just as good a tire for less money.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Kelly

customer_reviews.title: It fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: exact duplicate of my OEM tire. had to pay ten dollars to have it mounted at the local tire shop, but still a bargain at the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: GRB

customer_reviews.title: LUGS ARENT 3/4” DEEP
customer_reviews.text: They’re great in the mud as I knew from prior experience but not gonna lie they wear out pretty fast and puncture kinda easy. Lugs arent a true 3/4 deep. But as far as value for your money they’re the best option.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Smrcka

customer_reviews.title: If you're getting stuck, you're going to slow.
customer_reviews.text: Great tire for the price! Had a chance to get buried in some mud this weekend, well, I tried anyway. These ITP tires tore it up, flung the mud high, and launched me through the mud holes. I'll put these on another machine for sure, you should too!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper101

customer_reviews.title: Nice tire.
customer_reviews.text: Tire is cheaper than other places. Nice looking aggressive tire.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler B.

customer_reviews.title: Good tires, good price
customer_reviews.text: These tires have done what I have asked so far. They have handled mud and snow well, and have good traction for plowing. Especially for being on the lower cost end of atv tires, they seem very good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Charles L.

customer_reviews.title: Oh my !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I wasn't expecting much out of these tires but...damn they look great and rip through the mud, I set mine at 4 lbs and I havent been stuck yet! I play in some nasty Kentucky mud and they never let me down.....Hands down the best tire I've ever purchased. Oh yeah fast shipping too
customer_reviews.author: LEXINGTONKY

customer_reviews.title: Great mud tire.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to match up with rear. Deep tread works well. Rides rough at lower speeds on hard surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tire
customer_reviews.text: Thats ice in the picture btw. Excellent traction. Best feature is that it’s not coggy on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the value!!
customer_reviews.text: Great tire for the value. Fast ship. Has worked well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Went on my yamaha Tri Z 250. Good tires that keep me going through the mud
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Yamaha BW200 front tire
customer_reviews.text: Fits my BW200 front perfectly. BW200 is a two wheeler, so the round profile is good for cornering. It's a nice soft tire and rides good.
customer_reviews.author: John Nutter

customer_reviews.title: Good looking tread
customer_reviews.text: Fit a 1996 Suzuki king quad 300 perfectly. Time will tell how they hold up. Look great
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them.
customer_reviews.text: They’re itp’s. What else do I say? I’ve run them since new on my 2002 foreman. Got 18 years from my first set. Stop looking at reviews and Just buy them.
customer_reviews.author: That one guy

customer_reviews.title: Late delivery
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t show up on time, so that’s upsetting. I’m sure they are decent tires
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: I bought these tires for a friend for his atv ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tires for a friend for his atv for his birthday and man I will tell you he loves them these things are really ment to go on big 4x4 bikes but he didn't care he just threw them on his little 2 wheel drive moto 4 and just loves them will definitely be ordering more of these
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Ogas

customer_reviews.title: Great tires
customer_reviews.text: I only use these tires on my 4 wheelers , they will go through anything and wear like iron
customer_reviews.author: powder

customer_reviews.title: Mud Bugging Again
customer_reviews.text: Purchases these tires for my 2007 Honda 250ex atv. Received them a few days before the eta on the shipping notice. My purchase was 2 sets of 2 each - 22x11x9 and 22x8x10. When they arrived I was excited based on Michael Caswell's review. I had them mounted and they fit perfectly. Went mud riding and tracking was very good. I am extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marta h.

customer_reviews.title: Hang on Boy. Going for a ride up hill
customer_reviews.text: Good mud tires. Trail rideing Thrust the p.a. state forest trail system.
customer_reviews.author: Starman

customer_reviews.title: 4 wheeler tires
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 and they are sturdy and durable. Worked great on a hunting trip. I would recommend them and am going to buy 2 more in the Spring.
customer_reviews.author: Patti C

customer_reviews.title: great tires
customer_reviews.text: these tires are wonderful. 12" of snow- no problem, mud- no problem. use them on a Polaris sportsman 500 for farming work. very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Randy Ziegenhagen

customer_reviews.title: Fit 2010 bad boy buggy
customer_reviews.text: These tires are perfect! Put them on my 2010 bad boy buggy. The fit was perfect and the tread is awesome! Ready for any weather now! And received them 2 days early! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fronts were junk, recapped. Backs were great
customer_reviews.text: The back ones 24-10-11 we're great nothing wrong and the front 24-8-11 is where my issues is at. They were seconds/recapped, did not say anything about it being seconds. I wouldn't buy the front ones again but the backs were new and excellent. Would recommend going to a dealership instead of buying here
customer_reviews.author: Randy nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great tires
customer_reviews.text: Perfect combination trail and mud tires. Gets my sons atv through a lot of muck, they work great.
customer_reviews.author: fornipez

customer_reviews.title: orwatch me ride past you when you have a
customer_reviews.text: ITP has been my go to tire for years on the quads...we are talking shale rock mountain riding...snow..ice..MUD! they rock! Spend the dough! or watch me ride past you when you have a flat
customer_reviews.author: user name 14072

customer_reviews.title: Great tire at affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Aggressive enough tread for the needs of a farm quad in the mountains!
customer_reviews.author: Carla R Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality with a reasonable price. Not just the product is great, but the supplier, PowerSports911 does business the right way. I initially ordered the wrong size. It was no problem at all getting authorization to return and get my refund. I will remember this on future orders.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: They definitely work better than the stock tires in the mud but I ...
customer_reviews.text: They definitely work better than the stock tires in the mud but I still get stuck where I feel I should be able to get through. Nothing too bad, just muddy trails and still getting stuck
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, worked for what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted these for our older 4 wheeler and didn't want to spend a lot of money. These were perfect and we're very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Great tire
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for a tire I punctured when running through some brush. Had the original set for 5 years and besides the new tire being clean, you could not tell I replaced a tire as the set has held up wonderfully. Riding mostly dirt and gravel, minimal on asphalt.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great value and performance
customer_reviews.text: Been using this tire on my Polaris Sportsman 500 for two years now. Excellent traction, made snow plowing easier and proven to be a rugged tire on ATV trails. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: T Smith

customer_reviews.title: Bullet proof
customer_reviews.text: These tires are bullet proof. Took them hunting is places I never should have gone
customer_reviews.author: Travis Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Good product for a yamaha breeze
customer_reviews.text: Installed these on my sons Yamaha breeze and he loves them. They go great on the trails and mud. They are thick enough ply but soft enough for a good ride.
customer_reviews.author: J.K.Yates

customer_reviews.title: Didn't take long to get it.
customer_reviews.text: Used this tire for my Polaris four-wheeler fit just like it should working great.
customer_reviews.author: Merlin Goering

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My husband got these for a 4 wheeler has was building.. They are perfect, work and look great! Extremely satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: These tires get great traction without being too hard on the yard grass ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two as rear tires on my ATC 250 Big Red. They shipped quickly and arrived without incident. These tires get great traction without being too hard on the yard grass or smaller bikes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great tires, great traction and ride awesome. Quick shipping as well. Would definitely recommend to someone who rides frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: These were priced lower than other tires however, cheaper didn't affect quality. I could not be more pleased with my purchase. Very aggressive tread really made difference on my Honda 250 2 wheel drive. Shipping was super fast got them in 2 days!
customer_reviews.author: HVY DTY 001

customer_reviews.title: Tire popped after one drive
customer_reviews.text: Tire was taken to a tire shop and had it blown up to the correct PSI per manufacture spec, mounted on ATV and without any use of tire the sidewall of the tire blew. Very disappointed in the sturdiness of product.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Vance

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: So far these are awesome. I put them on my 2005 trx500 foreman. The only bummer were the little knobbies right at the rim it leaked a little so I would recommend cutting those off before installation.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Carson

customer_reviews.title: Tires fell apart within a hundred miles
customer_reviews.text: Just bought these tires in only put a 100 miles on them and they started the laminating the top layer is just peeling off
customer_reviews.author: cory ash

customer_reviews.title: plowing
customer_reviews.text: I put them on my 8X8 argo and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Casey A Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Tire
customer_reviews.text: These are great tires. I have had them for over 5 years and they are still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: HEMPSENG

customer_reviews.title: Great Tire!
customer_reviews.text: Put these on my Gator 4x2. Great replacement tire. Thought the tread might be too aggressive for the lawn area but its not. Expect these to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: 1993 Kawasaki bayou 220
customer_reviews.text: Tires seems of good quality. The rubber is a little soft but most mud tires are. Haven't got them mounted yet but should be a big improvement for the little bayou 220
customer_reviews.author: Bobby P.

customer_reviews.title: Great in mud
customer_reviews.text: These tires are aggressive and work great in mud highly recommended them
customer_reviews.author: Nick B

customer_reviews.title: Havent got stuck yet!
customer_reviews.text: These Tires are amazing, they just look mean once installed, and i havent been stuck in the mud yet!
customer_reviews.author: CR125 RACING LEGEND

customer_reviews.title: These tires are pretty soft. Got a pinhole leak in week 1 ...
customer_reviews.text: These tires are pretty soft. Got a pinhole leak in week 1 with very little use. Good general purpose tire but anything more than standard trails and you might have issues.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Best replasement and made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Fits 9" rim and is the best replacement for stock tire. Tire has great self cleaning lugs and strong side wall. The tire is a little taller and wider than stock and fit with no issue. Now my yamaha 350 is keeping up with my 700
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth ride..
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the ride, traction and performance so lets see how they last...
customer_reviews.author: GAY J COLE

customer_reviews.title: This tire is not the best quality.
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it looks, however.. the factory info says to fill it up to 25 psi to seat the bead, which I did. 1/4 of the tire bubbled and is now VERY unbalanced. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT PERFECT PERFECT...
customer_reviews.text: Well made, solid tires for front replacements on Yamaha 250 ATV. Very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Ace Cool

customer_reviews.title: Great Tire
customer_reviews.text: These tires fit perfect on my 2006 Polaris Sportsman 500. They felt great on the ride i went on.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Great front tires for ATC/ATV
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tires for Atc/Atv fronts. This is the second one I've gotten to replace an old worn out plain round knobby and the improvements in handling are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory M. Ravy

customer_reviews.title: good tire
customer_reviews.text: bought these tires for a 1986 honda 250es 3 wheeler they look good and fit right.
customer_reviews.author: Dixieland Motorsports

customer_reviews.title: Hunting Transportation
customer_reviews.text: Met my expectation in every way for their purpose of transportation across the terrain we travel during deer hunting in Oklahoma.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: MC-Powersports ROCKS!
customer_reviews.text: Love the tires and MC-Powersports is freaking AWESOME! SUPER fast shipping. I HIGHLY recommend these guys!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bybee

customer_reviews.title: Best tire ive ever had
customer_reviews.text: Super great traction in deep mud. I can idle through what I wouldn't even try with the stock tires. Even when the treads are full of mud there are still biting edges. Great design.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Good value for your bank
customer_reviews.text: Soft and great tread action on the trials and in the woods
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM H.

customer_reviews.title: A must for your ATV
customer_reviews.text: These things are a monster on the ATV and work much better than ever expected..Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: T. Ehli

customer_reviews.title: Tires are great, they look mean that's awesome
customer_reviews.text: Tires are great, they look mean that's awesome. It says it may take up to 10 days to deliver but mine took only 2 days I was surprised and happy!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Fraire.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the original Carlisles with these. The originals lasted about 2000 miles. Dirt and road mixed. Hope these do as well. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: HSS

customer_reviews.title: 4 wheeler tires
customer_reviews.text: Super Fast Shipping. Put these in my Honda 4 wheeler
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Wallis

customer_reviews.title: best value
customer_reviews.text: This is the best overall value based on price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip D. Tulim

customer_reviews.title: Great tires
customer_reviews.text: You cannot go wrong with these tires. Great all around tire.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great tires excellent traction 👍
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my Honda fatcat. Excellent upgrade from the original stock tires.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hulick

customer_reviews.title: Bad tires
customer_reviews.text: After about 2 weeks being in my John Deere gator it got a bubble in the side wall.. only had it at 15 psi too terrible tire don’t waste your money on it
customer_reviews.author: Jake bell

customer_reviews.title: Love em.
customer_reviews.text: Great tires, fast shipping and a fair price. I would buy again from this seller. These are so much better than stock. While they are stiffer I have never cut them on the trails and this is my second set. USA!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: cost was an issue.
customer_reviews.text: Like to buy local, but at twice the price no way. These tires where a great deal.Delivery was Super Fast,only 5 days to AK.
customer_reviews.author: William Stock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product at a great value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product at a great value. Purchased 2 and had local tire shop mount on wheels for $10 each. Overall cost was still $30 cheaper than they could sold and mounted a pair of popular 2 ply tires. Even with aggressive tread the ride is extremely smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: bought them before from amazon, came in early. work great in the kind of muck I put them in
customer_reviews.author: Machine

customer_reviews.title: Great for lighter
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 1987 Yamaha moto 4. Went on about 3 rides with them. They work VERY well!! Got me out of many sticky situations. Defiently recommend these tires for lighter quads!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ITP Mud Lite AT Mud Terrain ATV Tire 23x8-11
